00001 /** 
00002 @mainpage Octeon Common Component
00003 
00004 @section common_contents Contents
00005 
00006     - @ref introduction
00007     - @ref fpa_buffer_monitoring
00008 
00009 @section introduction 1 Introduction
00010 
00011  OCTEON common component provides support to other 
00012  compoentns including TCP, IP, ENET, PCI driver etc. One of
00013  the service provided by common component is to monitor the 
00014  invalid behaviour of the software  which may result in FPA 
00015  unit corruption. This feature is also  known as FPA Buffer 
00016  Integrity Monitoring.
00017 
00018 
00019 @section fpa_buffer_monitoring 2 FPA Buffer Integrity Monitoring
00020  Octeon FPA unit does not perform any intelligent operations from 
00021  preventing the software corrupting its pools. Software can do a
00022  number of operations which can result in FPA pool corruption 
00023  including:
00024 
00025     - freeing a NULL pointer to FPA pool
00026     - freeing a garbage pointer to FPA pool
00027     - freeing the same pointer twice
00028     - freeing a pointer to wrong FPA pool
00029 
00030  The FPA buffer integrity monitoring feature provides software support
00031  to catch all these error conditions.
00032 
00033  Below is a list of various component common macros and functions which
00034  are used by this feature:
00035 
00036      - cvm_common_fpa_add_pool_info()
00037      - cvm_common_fpa_display_all_pool_info()
00038      - CVM_COMMON_CHECK_FPA_POOL()
00039      - CVM_COMMON_WHICH_FPA_POOL()
00040      - CVM_COMMON_INIT_FPA_CHECKS()
00041      - CVM_COMMON_MARK_FPA_BUFFER_ALLOC()
00042      - CVM_COMMON_MARK_FPA_BUFFER_FREE()
00043      - CVM_COMMON_CHECK_BUFFER_BOUNDRIES()
00044      - cvm_common_alloc_fpa_buffer_sync()
00045      - cvm_common_alloc_fpa_buffer()
00046      - cvm_common_free_fpa_buffer()
00047      - cvm_common_mbuf_free()
00048      - cvm_common_packet_free()
00049      - cvm_common_discard_swp()
00050    
00051 */
